overview: Ye-ji who’s been living in the same neighborhood as her crush Jin-gyoo, asks Woo-yeong to live a good life with Jin-gyoo. Jin-gyoo and Ye-ji became a couple but in fact, Jin-gyoo’s sex partner went to Seoul so he can meet Ye-ji instead. Ye-ji is angry with Jin-gyoo, and Woo-yeong comforts her.
title: Church Sister and First Lady
